name: @gov-design-system-ce/styles
description: This package includes Gov Design System CE Styles.
author: Zdeněk Vítek

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run copyPackages
scripts.compile: npm run copyAll && npm run sass && npm run copyAllFinished && npm run sassGlobal && npm run sassContent && npm run sassLayout && npm run sassCritical && npm run sassPrint
scripts.copyAll: copyfiles --up 2 ./../core/src/components/**/*.scss dist/components_ && copyfiles --up 2 ./../core/src/components/**/**/*.scss dist/components_ && node run.js
scripts.copyAllFinished: copyfiles --flat dist/components_/**/*.css dist/components && copyfiles --flat dist/components_/**/**/*.css dist/components && rimraf dist/components_
scripts.serve: npm run compile && npm run copyServe
